CustomField.formula: IF( Employee_Relationship_Score__c >=6, IMAGE("/resource/1458795666000/CSAT_Satisfied", ""), IF( AND( Employee_Relationship_Score__c <6, Employee_Relationship_Score__c >=3), IMAGE("/resource/1458795691000/CSAT_Neutral",""), IMAGE("/resource/1458795716000/CSAT_Dissatisfied","",22,22)) )
CustomField.label: Buildcorp Relationship
